description: 4.73x33mm DM11 caseless cartridge, shaped like a rectangular prism, housing a jacketed 51 gr bullet inside of an advanced propellant body.  Upon firing, the body will be consumed, leaving nothing behind in the chamber.
//: The 4.73 mm round is half the weight and 40% the size by volume of the 5.56Ã—45mm NATO round
//2: Based and scaled from 8mm_caseless . Arbitrary price. Dispersion set so hk_g11 + 473x33_dm11 = ( hk_g3 + 762_51 ) / 2

description: A bootleg duplicate of the 4.73x33mm DM11 caseless round.

4.73x33mm DM11 caseless cartridge, shaped like a rectangular prism, housing a jacketed 51 gr bullet inside of an advanced propellant body.  Upon firing, the body will be consumed, leaving nothing behind in the chamber.
